attributes.action: Make Mr Blair publish all letters relating to Iraq war for the Chilcott enquiry
attributes.additional_details:
The proposal to only publish the Gist of Mr Blairs letters is wrong, for full transparency in the report the full details must be published as in other enquiry's.
Anything less will leave the enquiry being viewed as a waste of time and money.
The government views it as acceptable for its citizens communications to be monitored and accessed, so elected servant's must have their communications open to scrutiny
